StringTable.Label: SolarPowerPlant_Name
StringTable.String: Solar Power Plant

StringTable.Label: SolarPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes factories more efficient, and boosts Production.

StringTable.Label: SolarPowerPlant_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides a dedicated power source, boosting production of neighboring factors, and the entire colony.

StringTable.Label: ResearchCoordinationCenter_Name
StringTable.String: Coordination Center

StringTable.Label: ResearchCoordinationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes laboratories more efficient, and boosts Research.

StringTable.Label: ResearchCoordinationCenter_Dec
StringTable.String: By helping our greatest minds cooperate, these centers make multidisciplinary breakthroughs more likely, and improve the effectiveness of nearby research facilities.

StringTable.Label: XenoFarm_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Farm

StringTable.Label: XenoFarm_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Raises the population cap of our world.

StringTable.Label: XenoFarm_Dec
StringTable.String: Feeding everyone is the first and most important step to growing a colony. These farms are specifically designed to help a new colony get started.

StringTable.Label: AdaptiveFarm_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Farm

StringTable.Label: AdaptiveFarm_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Raises the population cap of our world.

StringTable.Label: AdaptiveFarm_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to not only compensate for alien environments, but thrive there, adaptive farms greatly increase a colony's food output.

StringTable.Label: IntensiveFarm_Name
StringTable.String: Intensive Farm

StringTable.Label: IntensiveFarm_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Raises the population cap of our world.

StringTable.Label: IntensiveFarm_Dec
StringTable.String: Intensive farms use the latest developments in agricultural science to maximize nutrient delivery and solar energy extraction, resulting in a massive increase in a colony's food output.

StringTable.Label: LosslessFarm_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Farm

StringTable.Label: LosslessFarm_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Raises the population cap of our world.

StringTable.Label: LosslessFarm_Dec
StringTable.String: Lossless farms achieve almost perfect nutrient extraction efficiency, capable of using almost any waste stream as a nutrient and biomass source.

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryDefenseSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense System

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryDefenseSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Helps defend against planetary invasions.

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: A basic planetary defense system will go a long way towards organizing our population into a capable defensive militia should the need ever arise.

StringTable.Label: OmegaDefenseSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Omega Defense System

StringTable.Label: OmegaDefenseSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost hitpoints of all ships defending planet.

StringTable.Label: OmegaDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Omega Defense System uses the latest in hardening field technology to boost the structural strength of all friendly ships in orbit of this planet.

StringTable.Label: BureauofLabor_Name
StringTable.String: Bureau of Labor

StringTable.Label: BureauofLabor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows colony production to be adjusted manually.

StringTable.Label: BureauofLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: The Bureau of Labor will allows the local government to better allocate its precious production resources.

StringTable.Label: AmusementPark_Name
StringTable.String: Amusement Park

StringTable.Label: AmusementPark_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Approval.

StringTable.Label: AmusementPark_Dec
StringTable.String: Amusement Parks provide the sweet snacks and nauseating rides necessary for keeping your people subdued.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumRefinery_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Refinery

StringTable.Label: DurantiumRefinery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generates Manufacturing Points per turn, but requires Durantium to build.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumRefinery_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates Manufacturing Points per turn,, but requires Durantium to build.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumDataArchive_Name
StringTable.String: Thulium Data Archive

StringTable.Label: ThuliumDataArchive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generates Research Points per turn, but requires Thulium to build.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumDataArchive_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates 5 Research Points per turn, but requires Thulium to build.

StringTable.Label: PromethionReserve_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Reserve

StringTable.Label: PromethionReserve_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generates Credits per turn, but requires Promethion to build.

StringTable.Label: PromethionReserve_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Morale of a colony, but requires Promethion to build.

StringTable.Label: AntimatterPowerPlant_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the abilities of all Improvements Adjacent to it.

StringTable.Label: EleriumDefenseShield_Name
StringTable.String: Elerium Defense Shield

StringTable.Label: EleriumDefenseShield_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes a planet nearly invulnerable to traditional invasion methods, but requires Elerium to build.

StringTable.Label: EleriumDefenseShield_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes a planet nearly invulnerable to traditional invasion methods.

StringTable.Label: PromethionPleasurePark_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Pleasure Park

StringTable.Label: PromethionPleasurePark_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Morale of a colony, but requires Promethion to build.

StringTable.Label: PromethionPleasurePark_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Morale of a colony, but requires Promethion to build.
